instruction: Please provide a cohesive analysis of our real estate portfolio to ensure we are prepared for any disruption and risk during the pandemic.
output: Thank you for your request. Our team will conduct a comprehensive analysis of your real estate portfolio, including core, open-end, and opportunistic closed-end funds. By identifying similar systematic occupier, financial, and economic drivers, we will provide transparency and a consistent analytical technique. This analysis will allow us to fully understand the risks involved in your portfolio and provide recommendations to stay on top of any disruption and risk during the pandemic.
